00035 CellCacheScanner::CellCacheScanner(CellCachePtr &cellCachePtr, ScanContextPtr &scanContextPtr) : CellListScanner(scanContextPtr), m_cell_cache_ptr(cellCachePtr), m_cell_cache_mutex(cellCachePtr->m_mutex), m_cur_key(0), m_cur_value(0), m_eos(false) {
00036   ByteString bs;
00037   size_t start_row_len = strlen(scanContextPtr->start_row.c_str()) + 1;
00038   size_t end_row_len = strlen(scanContextPtr->end_row.c_str()) + 1;
00039   DynamicBuffer dbuf( 7 + std::max(start_row_len, end_row_len) );
00040 
00041   {
00042     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00043     Key keyComps;
00044 
00045     assert(scanContextPtr->start_row <= scanContextPtr->end_row);
00046 
00048     dbuf.clear();
00049     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, scanContextPtr->start_row.c_str(), start_row_len);
00050     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00051     m_start_iter = m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(bs);
00052 
00054     dbuf.clear();
00055     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, scanContextPtr->end_row.c_str(), end_row_len);
00056     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00057     m_end_iter = m_cell_cache_ptr->m_cell_map.lower_bound(bs);
00058 
00059     m_cur_iter = m_start_iter;
00060 
00061     while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00062       if (!keyComps.load((*m_cur_iter).first)) {
00063         HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00064       }
00065       else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW || m_scan_context_ptr->familyMask[keyComps.column_family_code]) {
00066         m_cur_key = (*m_cur_iter).first;
00067         m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + (CellCache::OFFSET_BIT_MASK & (*m_cur_iter).second);
00068         return;
00069       }
00070       m_cur_iter++;
00071     }
00072     m_eos = true;
00073     return;
00074   }
00075 
00076 }

00079 bool CellCacheScanner::get(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00080   if (!m_eos) {
00081     key = m_cur_key;
00082     value = m_cur_value;
00083     return true;
00084   }
00085   return false;
00086 }

00090 void CellCacheScanner::forward() {
00091   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_cell_cache_mutex);
00092   Key keyComps;
00093 
00094   m_cur_iter++;
00095   while (m_cur_iter != m_end_iter) {
00096     if (!keyComps.load((*m_cur_iter).first)) {
00097       HT_ERROR("Problem parsing key!");
00098     }
00099     else if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW || m_scan_context_ptr->familyMask[keyComps.column_family_code]) {
00100       m_cur_key = (*m_cur_iter).first;
00101       m_cur_value.ptr = m_cur_key.ptr + (CellCache::OFFSET_BIT_MASK & (*m_cur_iter).second);
00102       return;
